import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import '../css/App.css' const BACKDROP_IMG_BASE_URL = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" const MovieDetails = () => { const location = useLocation() return (

{location.state.original_title}

{location.state.overview}

) } export default MovieDetails
